main event: Two observers noted a round, red-green-blue object pulsating in the sky traveling in a westerly direction before disappearing near Ovid, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was reported to pulsate like a heartbeat and change size during observation., It was first observed traveling at a distance of about 500 yards off the ground., The object disappeared behind trees to the west during the first observation., Witnesses included a college student and a factory foreman from the area., The sighting lasted for about 1 hour and 15 minutes.
sighted object: round, red-green-blue object in the sky
witness description: A college student, a high school student, and a retired individual from the area.
